title: Klimawechsel
overview: Four women, all teachers at Munich's Novalis high school, feel the sword of Damocles of the menopause threateningly hover above them - Angelika has hot flashes, Beate uncontrolled emotional outbursts, Cornelia gets panic attacks and Desiree is suffering from nervous exhaustion. However, all four realize that life also continues in this stage of life - albeit on winding paths.
